Sound.Modifications: Cut off sounds after the engine ignition

Model.Modifications: Adjusted to fit within the driving simulator, e.g. frame-based physics were adapted.

Model.Title: Ambulance
Model.Author: Poly by Google
Model.Modifications: - Resized the model - Split the model into single parts - Set the origin of each wheel to its center

Model.Title: concept-sedan-01v2
Model.Author: Andrew Kator and Jennifer Legaz
Model.Modifications: - The wheels are grouped - Orientation center of the wheel moved to object - Orientation center of the steering wheel moved to object - Resized the Model

Model.Title: concept-sedan-02
Model.Author: Andrew Kator and Jennifer Legaz
Model.Modifications: - The wheels are grouped - Orientation center of the wheel moved to object - Orientation center of the steering wheel moved to object - Resized the model

Model.Title: Bangladesh Fire Service and Civi

Model.Modifications: - Set origin of tires to the geometric center - Separated the mesh of the rear tires and the interiors - Resized the model

Model.Title: Fire Truck
Model.Author: Ivan Klus
Model.Modifications: - Resized the model - Set the origin of each tire to its center - Grouped the parts of each tire - Rotated the model

Model.Title: Ford Focus

Model.Modifications: - Ungrouped the wheels and set the origin to each wheel - Resized the car
